::DrillBit::

DrillBit was having a hell of a time holding KitKat, then came the
punch.
"Outch!" He let go.
"Hey KitKat, that hurt." He then relized what was going on. He grabed
her, with a little more forc, by the shoulders, making her look him in
the eye.
"KitKat! Its me, DrillBit! Calm down, love!" He said.

::K-9::

K-9 watched it all from a distance, seeing what was going on. He almost
laughed when KitKat punched DrillBit. He was waiting for the right
momeant to strike.
